pageContext.claim: “President Obama and Vice President Biden never even tried to fix [policing] during their eight-year period. The reason they didn't try is because they had no idea how to do it. And it is a complex situation.”
pageContext.analysis: Obama did try — whatever one concludes about the results. Instituting changes in law enforcement and police training takes years of sustained effort and conscientious follow-through. Trump will find that simply signing an executive order is only the start of a long process.
